objects.text:
• High-Fidelity Sound
• Active Noise Cancellation
• Transparency Mode
• AppleCare+ Protection

product_details.description: ULTIMATE OVER-EAR LISTENING EXPERIENCE — Apple-designed dynamic driver provides high-fidelity audio. Computational audio combines custom acoustic design with the Apple H1 chip and software for breakthrough listening experiences. FIVE FRESH COLORS — AirPods Max come in five fresh colors: Midnight, Starlight, Blue, Purple, and Orange. A color-matched Smart Case is also included. FOCUS ON WHAT’S PLAYING — Pro-level Active Noise Cancellation removes up to 2x more background noise, so you can immerse yourself in music.* HEAR THE WORLD AROUND YOU — Transparency mode lets you comfortably hear and interact with the world around you. WHY APPLECARE+ - Get protection, service and support direct from Apple. AppleCare+ covers unlimited repairs for accidental damage, like a cracked display, and includes coverage for the hardware and battery. Get convenient service at Apple Stores and Apple Authorized Service Providers around the world or Express Replacement Service so you don’t have to wait for a repair. Help is easy with 24/7 priority tech support from Apple experts. PEACE OF MIND - Each incident is subject to a service fee of $29. AUTOMATIC ACTIVATION - AppleCare+ is a digital purchase that is automatically activated when your device is delivered by Amazon so it’s already protected when it arrives at your door. There is no physical shipment for AppleCare+. PROOF OF COVERAGE EMAIL - You will receive an email from Amazon Marketplace with the AppleCare Proof of Coverage at time of device shipment. This email will contain your AppleCare+ agreement number, attached device serial number, coverage end date and link to the AppleCare+ terms and conditions. For gifts, please forward this email to the owner of the device. Brand - Apple ** Color - Blue ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Noise Control - Active Noise Cancellation **

banner_details:
This promotional banner showcases a premium audio product with a clean, tech-oriented design. The layout features a bold uppercase title (`heading`) and a supporting subheading (`subheading`) beneath it in contrasting, light blue color. Below, a short bulleted feature list (`description`) details the key benefits of the product. A large product image (`product_image`) dominates the right side of the composition, creating visual focus. The price (`price`) is prominently displayed in bold white typography near the lower-left area, supported by a clear call-to-action button (`cta` over `cta_background`) in soft blue. Decorative geometric elements and soft gradients enhance the modern tech aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: `#1E3A5F`
- Light Sky Blue: `#B0E0FF`
- Pale Blue Gradient: `#E0E5EC` to `#B0C4DE`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a modern, minimalist look with a primary focus on a smooth, elegant blue-gray shade. This dominant color (Hex: #7B9CAA) is blended across the headband and ear cushions, giving the headphones a uniform and sleek aesthetic. Subtle gradients and material textures help bring dimension, especially through the metallic sheen. Accent features like the connectors and mesh integrate deeper slate tones (Hex: #596F7A) for contrast. AppleCare+'s logo adds a striking touch with deep red (Hex: #E23838) and white (Hex: #F5F5F7), enhancing brand identity. Use this refined palette for a clean, professional advertisement that emphasizes innovation and luxury.
